meta.description: Language labels for database tables/fields belonging to extension 'beautyofcode'

languageKey.label: Sourcecode (beautyOfCode)
This plugin provides state-of-the-art, feature rich syntax highlighting.
Enable t3editor: Use syntax editor with syntax highlighting in Backend (t3editor)
Quellcode (beautyOfCode)
Dieses Plugin bietet umfangreiche Funktionen um Quellcode anzuzeigen.
Benutze t3editor: Benutze Syntax Highlighting im Backend (t3editor)
